item.title: 0956 JNJ
item.description: score:956 Chances: Johnson & Johnson is part of the Zacks top Analyst Blog, which could attract investor attention. JNJ is a longtime dividend payer and has earned the title of Dividend King, making it attractive to income-focused investors. The company’s involvement in appealing court appeals regarding talc-related claims may provide positive outcomes.
